abstract: The mortgage lender Countrywide Financial may have to pay Bank of America a fee of $160 million if a deal to buy it falls through, according to a regulatory filing on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: The mortgage lender Countrywide Financial may have to pay Bank of America a fee of $160 million if a deal to buy it falls through, according to a regulatory filing on Thursday.

headline.main: A High Price for Countrywide Deal’s Failure
